mapper.select: select trunc((count(*)/(select count(*) from pacch_member)*100)) value,user_gender gender from pacch_member group by user_gender

select nvl(m.joinDate,f.joinDate) joinDate,nvl(m.total,0) male,nvl(f.total,0) female,(nvl(m.total,0)+nvl(f.total,0)) total from (select to_char(join_date,'yyyy/MM/dd') joinDate,SUM(count(*)) OVER(ORDER BY to_char(join_date,'yyyy/MM/dd')) total from (select * from pacch_member where user_gender = '남') p group by to_char(join_date,'yyyy/MM/dd')) m FULL OUTER JOIN (select to_char(join_date,'yyyy/MM/dd') joinDate,SUM(count(*)) OVER(ORDER BY to_char(join_date,'yyyy/MM/dd')) total from (select * from pacch_member where user_gender = '여') p group by to_char(join_date,'yyyy/MM/dd')) f on m.joinDate = f.joinDate

select * from (select to_char(res_time,'yyyy/MM/dd') resTime,sum(pay_price) money from pacch_payment group by to_char(res_time,'yyyy/MM/dd') having to_char(res_time,'yyyy/MM/dd')<=sysdate order by to_char(res_time,'yyyy/MM/dd') desc) where rownum <= 7

select movie_name movieName,reserveseat,totalseat from (select movie_code,sum(180-countseat) reserveseat,sum(180) totalseat from pacch_schedule group by movie_code) m join pacch_movie p on m.movie_code = p.movie_code where p.isshow !='N'

update.selectKey: select count(*) dbcnt from pacch_visitors_log where to_char(logDate,'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi') = #{logDate}

choose.otherwise: update pacch_visitors_log set visitorCount = visitorCount+1 where to_char(logDate,'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi') = #{logDate}

mapper.select: select ldate,time,visitorCount from (select to_char(logdate,'yyyy/MM/dd') ldate,to_char(logdate,'hh24:mi') time,visitorCount from pacch_visitors_log where logDate > sysdate-4 order by logDate desc) order by ldate desc,time
